name: Cost Insights Daily Pipeline
description: Pipeline to aggregate google cloud costs incurred in any given day.

parameters.name: bigQueryProjectId
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud project where the billing export dataset is stored
parameters.label: BigQuery Project ID

parameters.name: bigQueryDatasetId
parameters.helpText: The dataset within BigQuery where the billing export table exists
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset ID

parameters.name: bigQueryTableId
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table where the billing export data is stored
parameters.label: BigQuery Table ID

parameters.name: bigtableProjectId
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud project where the Bigtable exports are to be made
parameters.label: Bigtable Project ID

parameters.name: bigtableInstanceId
parameters.helpText: The Bigtable instance where the required table exists
parameters.label: Bigtable Instance ID

parameters.name: bigtableTableId
parameters.helpText: The Bigtable table where the compiled data is to be exported
parameters.label: Bigtable Table ID

parameters.name: writeBQRowsToTextFile
parameters.helpText: Set to true if rows retrieved from BigQuery need to be written to a text file. Meant for testing, defaults to false
parameters.label: Write BigQuery Rows to text file

parameters.name: outputLocation
parameters.helpText: Location where the BigQuery rows formatted to text are to be written. Will not make a difference if writeBQRowsToTextFile is set to false
parameters.label: Output Location

parameters.name: aggregationDate
parameters.helpText: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) for which cost aggregations are to be done
parameters.label: Aggregation Date
